# stripe_v2_core_event_destination (Resource)

Set up an event destination to receive events from Stripe across multiple destination types, including [webhook endpoints](https://docs.stripe.com/webhooks) and [Amazon EventBridge](https://docs.stripe.com/event-destinations/eventbridge). Event destinations support receiving [thin events](https://docs.stripe.com/api/v2/events) and [snapshot events](https://docs.stripe.com/api/events).



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled_events` (List of String) The list of events to enable for this endpoint.
- `event_payload` (String) Payload type of events being subscribed to.
- `name` (String) Event destination name.
- `type` (String) Event destination type.

### Optional

- `amazon_eventbridge` (Block List, Max: 1) Amazon EventBridge configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--amazon_eventbridge))
- `description` (String) An optional description of what the event destination is used for.
- `events_from` (List of String) Where events should be routed from.
- `metadata` (Map of String) Metadata.
- `snapshot_api_version` (String) If using the snapshot event payload, the API version events are rendered as.
- `webhook_endpoint` (Block List, Max: 1) Webhook endpoint configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--webhook_endpoint))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--amazon_eventbridge"></a>
### Nested Schema for `amazon_eventbridge`

Required:

- `aws_account_id` (String) The AWS account ID.
- `aws_region` (String) The region of the AWS event source.


<a id="nestedblock--webhook_endpoint"></a>
### Nested Schema for `webhook_endpoint`

Required:

- `url` (String) The URL of the webhook endpoint.
